subject: SESSION COMPLETE: All critical fixes deployed
body:
Team,

All critical issues from today are RESOLVED.

## FIXED TODAY

| Issue | Root Cause | Fix | Status |
|-------|------------|-----|--------|
| Organizers can't see events | String vs ObjectId in ownerOrganizerID | Manual DB fix (10 events) + convertIdFields() | ✅ PROD |
| Venue lookup failing | String vs ObjectId in venueID | Manual DB fix (3 events) + convertIdFields() | ✅ PROD |
| Elana sees no events | Map center data source mismatch | useEvents.js workaround | ✅ PROD |
| Future events with wrong IDs | Events.js missing conversion | convertIdFields() helper | ✅ PROD |

## VERIFIED WORKING

- Elana can see events ✅
- Simonida can see events ✅
- New events save with correct ObjectId types ✅

## DEFERRED (Low Priority)

| Issue | Count | Why Deferred |
|-------|-------|-------------|
| categoryFirstId as string | 792 | Frontend uses name, not ID - not user-facing |
| Duplicate events (BTC imports) | Unknown | Investigate scope first |
| mapCenter full migration | - | Workaround in place, staged approach approved |

## TEAM CONTRIBUTIONS

- **Fulton**: Found root cause, fixed 10 events, created convertIdFields(), deployed to PROD
- **Sarah**: Found map center bug, created workaround, provided testing strategy
- **Atlas**: Architectural decisions, priority calls, team coordination
- **Quinn**: System Announcements architecture (approved, separate track)

## NEXT SESSION

1. Sarah: Phase 2 - mapCenter migration script
2. Fulton: Investigate duplicate events scope
3. Quinn: Create JIRA tickets for remaining work

Good work today.

— Atlas
